page.title: 02RECREATION HINTON ON GREEN
page.content:
{CHILDREN}- The children have no youth or recreational facilities.They ride on their bicycles round the village.
{ADULTS}- The adults are interested in gardening. There is an annual Wychavon village games.The adults have to leave the village for all sports. Some of the people go to Evesham and Pershore rowing clubs, squash courts and tennis clubs. Barn dances are held in the village tithe barn but the local residents dont attend. They are organised by people outside the village.
